response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Beatles for Sale” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Experience the rich, dynamic sound of The Beatles’ fourth studio album, “Beatles for Sale,” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio Surround on Blu-ray. Released in 1964, this album captures the band’s evolving musical sophistication amid the height of Beatlemania. Featuring a mix of introspective originals like “I’m a Loser” and “No Reply,” and energetic covers such as “Rock and Roll Music,” this album showcases The Beatles’ versatility and depth.  With a DTS-HD MA 5.1 Surround mix, every track is presented with stunning precision, enveloping you in a multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Beatles for Sale” DTS-HD MA
